channel.title: How do i make jad hit slower and less? Please help, thanks!
channel.description: How would i go about making Jad hit SLOWER and LESS? He currently hit's like 50 & 75 in about a second... How would i make him hit slower and not so high?

item.title: How do i make jad hit slower and less? Please help, thanks!
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:4, topic:301036”]Pvp sources suck, tbh.
I prefer clean sources, or just coding them out from scratch… (Borrowing codes isn’t so bad either)

Anyways, I’m not sure how to do this, though I WOULD like to know myself.[/quote]

Hah Well, i like PK sources. Most of the players stay rather than leave after a while cause they get bored. But, your opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make jad hit slower and less? Please help, thanks!
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:2, topic:301036”][quote author=PushedPrawn link=topic=397346.msg2949971#msg2949971 date=1252442976]
How would i go about making Jad hit SLOWER and LESS? He currently hit’s like 50 & 75 in about a second… How would i make him hit slower and not so high?
[/quote]
That’s actually a very good question.

What source?[/quote]

It’s a PK source… PVP-Evolution, but I’m trying to add the Jad as an “I’m bored, gimme somethin’ to do” kinda thing. Lol If you could help, i would be greatly appreciated!

Read full topic
